name: Baxton_Studio_Milo_Dark_Brown_Espresso_Modern_Storage_Shelf
reviews: I love this bookshelf it fits great in my bedroom
Very Elegant and good in any kind of living room as stand alone peace!

I looked everywhere for what I considered to be the perfect wall unit or shelving unit for our living room. I almost decided to have one made to my specs, but then I found this unit. It's the perfect size and has such a contemporary look to it. It's perfect! We've had it for quite a while now and it's still just as perfect! Very easy to put together. I did it one night in about 20-30 minutes by myself.
This is a bery noce and modern piece of furniture. I am happy with my purchase!
It looks exactly like the photo, sturdy and it was easy to put together.

Although the shelf was a bit smaller than what I had anticipated (the picture made it look grander than expected, but I should have looked at the dimensions more closely), it is a wonderfully designed shelf that uniquely displays my natural history collection. The set up took awhile with its many parts, but the instructions are good. The only flaw I see is the quality; one of the edges started chipping away even though the shelf is placed in a low foot traffic area. Despite this, the shelf is great with its complex yet clean design.
Perfect addition to our room. Super stylish. A great place for displaying your collections.
description:
Add fashion and functionality to your home with this unique modern shelf that bucks tradition and brings an artistic flair to your living space. Its innovative design creatively provides nine shelves to give you ample room for a dazzling display, and with a weight capacity of 200 pounds, you don't have to worry about its durability. For easy maintenance, this espresso brown shelf wipes clean with a simple dry cloth.
Contemporary shelving unitDark brown /espresso faux wood grain paper veneerEngineered wood frameDoubles as a room dividerWipe clean with a dry clothSet includes: One (1) shelving unitMaterials: Engineered wood frameFinish: dark brown /espressoWeight capacity: 200 poundsDimensions(overall): 47.25 inches high x47.25 inches wide x 11.5 inches long StyleContemporary, ModernMaterialVeneer, WoodFinishBrown FinishShelf TypeDisplay, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of ShelfMore than 9
